response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your highest standards. This product holds immense value for us, but recognizing its potential impact on your business, we believe it's worth sharing with you. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This price reflects our commitment to ensuring that the value it brings to your organization exceeds its cost. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to benefit significantly. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1150000}
